timeline.message:
Cleanups to WebSocket CloseStatus

Signed-off-by: Lachlan Roberts <lachlan@webtide.com>

timeline.bodyText: Rather than have this switch here, that has to be maintained, it really feels like we should have an enum with both the code and the string.... hmmmm
timeline.author: gregw

replies.bodyText: It's difficult because we aren't restricted to these defined values here, it could be any int within the 1000-5000 range.
replies.author: lachlan-roberts
